messages.message:
@Filippo @Raul Mächler Are they aware of our new *Deep Dive* section on the Settings -> Usage page that went GA this week?

It allows you to filter units consumed by Date, Type of usage (app, project, chatbot), Source (the specific app), and Workspace. This enables them to see exactly where they are consuming units and when.

I think they are specially saying they want it show in the build interface the projected cost of the solution per run, I think we know it is not as easy as that though. They are aware there is usage tracking coming but this was more around a build request.
@Raul Mächler got it - the backlog item to track is probably this ticket then: https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-3771
